cms-navigation.structure: Navigation items have: - label: Display text - href: URL (use `/pages/{slug}?locale=en` format) - location: "header" | "footer" | "both" - visible: true/false (hide without deleting)
cms-navigation.tools: - `cms_getNavigation` → list all nav items - `cms_addNavigationItem` → add new item - `cms_updateNavigationItem` → change href/location - `cms_toggleNavigationItem` → show/hide - `cms_removeNavigationItem` → delete
cms-navigation.examples:
**List navigation:** "What nav items do we have?" → cms_getNavigation() → [{label, href, location, visible}]
**Add item:** "Add Services to navigation" → cms_addNavigationItem({label: "Services", href: "/pages/services?locale=en", location: "both"})
**Update href:** "Change About link to /pages/company?locale=en" → cms_updateNavigationItem({label: "About", newHref: "/pages/company?locale=en"})
**Hide item:** "Hide Contact from navigation" → cms_toggleNavigationItem({label: "Contact"}) → now hidden
**Remove item:** "Delete Services link" → cms_removeNavigationItem({label: "Services"})
**After page creation:** When creating pages, offer: "Add to navigation?" On "yes" → cms_addNavigationItem({label: pageName, href: "/pages/{slug}?locale=en", location: "both"})
